markdown.markdown:
<!-- ## Research Themes -->

<!-- ::: {layout-ncol=3} -->
<!-- [{{< bi lightbulb-fill  >}}](https://olesonlab.github.io/research.html#themes) -- Social-ecological systems modeling, valuation, and decision science {{< pagebreak >}} -->

<!-- [{{< bi currency-dollar >}}](https://olesonlab.github.io/research.html#themes) -- Natural capital and green accounting {{< pagebreak >}} -->

<!-- [{{< bi water  >}}](https://olesonlab.github.io/research.html#themes) -- Marine management {{< pagebreak >}} -->

<!-- ::: -->


### 2022

Fezzi, C., [D. Ford]{.underline}, **K.L.L. Oleson** (2022). The economic value of coral reefs: climate change impacts and spatial targeting of restoration measures. *Ecological Economics*.

[Article](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ecolecon.2022.107628){.btn .btn-outline-dark .btn-theme target="_blank"}

[Wilmot, E.]{.underline}, J. Wong, Y. Tsang, A.J. Lynch, D. Infante, **K.L.L. Oleson**, A. Strauch, H. Cliverd (2022). Characterizing mauka-to-makai connections for aquatic ecosystem conservation on Maui, Hawaiʻi. *Ecological Informatics*. 70:101704.

[Article](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ecoinf.2022.101704){.btn .btn-outline-dark .btn-theme target="_blank"}

### 2021

[Article](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.marpol.2021.104766){.btn .btn-outline-dark .btn-theme target="_blank"}

[Article](https://doi.org/10.3389/fcosc.2021.669105){.btn .btn-outline-dark .btn-theme target="_blank"}

### 2017

### 2015

## Book Chapters^[Denotations: \* is co-primary author, and [students/advisees]{.underline} are underscored]

### 2017
